author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Babor Men Spa Package at Beverly HiltonTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Babor Men Spa Package at Beverly Hilton Published on : Thursday, August 13, 2015
The Beverly Hilton help you feel renewed and enriched at the Aqua Star BABOR Beauty Spa, where seasoned specialists await to awaken your senses, soothe skin, and beautify your body with exclusive treatments from BABOR. A German beauty pioneer since 1956, BABOR is known for blending the best of nature with the most technologically advanced science. The results culminate in a world-class spa experience at The Beverly Hilton, reinforcing the Southern California tradition of health and wellness that has long defined our hotel.
BABOR Men facial presents VITAL AKTIV BOOSTING FACIAL. Cleansing, clarifying and boosting energy will be at the forefront of this facial. Customised to the needs of male skin and their daily rituals, this treatment provides vitality and enhanced energy while soothing irritation from shaving and moisturising the skin for long lasting results.
Source:-Hilton
